body_html:
It looks like you installed with setup_caffe2.py, as setuptools (the Python package behind setup.py scripts) is what installs .egg files.

Could you try pip uninstall caffe2 and conda install -c caffe2 caffe2-cuda9.0-cudnn7 ? This way should be much faster too.

If the pip uninstall caffe2 doesn't seem to work, then you can manually uninstall by deleting every file and folder under /home/sam/anaconda3/envs/caffe36/ that has 'caffe' or 'caffe2' in the name.

body:
It looks like you installed with setup_caffe2.py, as setuptools (the Python package behind setup.py scripts) is what installs .egg files.

Could you try `pip uninstall caffe2` and `conda install -c caffe2 caffe2-cuda9.0-cudnn7` ? This way should be much faster too.

If the pip uninstall caffe2 doesn't seem to work, then you can manually uninstall by deleting every file and folder under /home/sam/anaconda3/envs/caffe36/ that has 'caffe' or 'caffe2' in the name.
